page.title: 18EVERY DAY LIFE
page.content:
WORK AND TRAVEL
As can be seen the population increased dramatically from 1961_1976. This was due to many houses being built at a reasonable price. From the area it is easy to commute to London via the British Rail station at Kelvedon,two and a half miles away; Ipswich,Colchester,Chelmsford and London via the A12 major trunk road.
HOUSING
In 1985 the average price of a three bedroomed semi_detached house in Tiptree is about Â£35,000, a detached four bedroomed house on an estate about Â£45,000_Â£50,000 and a large detached house in the surrounding countryside would be about Â£80,000_Â£100,000.
